abstract: Mexican authorities find at least 19 partly burned bodies in canyon in Guerrero State.
lead_paragraph: The federal officials said eight of at least 19 bodies had been partly burned, and two more were found in pieces.

headline.main: Mexico: Bodies Discovered Dumped in Southern State
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Bodies Discovered Dumped in Southern State

snippet: The federal officials said eight of at least 19 bodies had been partly burned, and two more were found in pieces.
